result.reason: Feature request to allow connecting with temporary options (dialog) and connecting without credentials. Verified functionality is partially implemented in recent commits (ConnectionContextMenu.cs, FrmConnectWithOptions.cs).
result.approach: Enhance context menu with 'Connect with options' submenu. Implement FrmConnectWithOptions to allow editing connection properties ad-hoc. Implement 'Connect without credentials' by passing Force.NoCredentials flag to connection initiator.
